## TextAreaBuilderOptions.lineNumberStyle property

Style for line numbers.

**Signature:**

```typescript
lineNumberStyle?: Style;
```

## Remarks

Uses `Style` from `@boba-cli/chapstick` to apply terminal colors and formatting to line numbers when `showLineNumbers` is enabled.
